channel.title: Time Out Singapore RSS API - Venues

item.title: Singapore Repertory Theatre
item.description: This is the Singapore Repertory Theatre office, but most productions are staged at DBS Arts Centre.

item.title: Beer Market
item.description: 'Buy low, drink high', cautions the owners of this stock market-inspired concept bar in Clarke Quay, where the price of beer goes up when the demand is high, and vice-versa. Each alcoholic beverage is 'listed' and displayed on LCD screens, with prices updated every half hour. But unlike a real trading floor, here you actually look forward to market crashes. There are also daily themes. Tuesdays are Banker's Night to tie in with the opening of the London and NY Stock Exchange, while Thursdays are dubbed Fabulous Night honouring writers and artists by featuring absinthe as the house special.
